Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters

Class StudentHostingCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters.CharacterCard
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters.StudentHostingCard
public class StudentHostingCard extends CharacterCard
This Class represent the StudentHostingCard, a card that can have a set of Students that the user can pick

      Uses a Character Card effect
      Specified by:
      useCard in class CharacterCard

      currentPlayer - The current Player who used the card

      an integer holding the numeric result of the effect

    • moveStudents

      private void moveStudents(Student s, int numberOfStudentsToMove, Player pSource, Player pDest, int dstIslandIndex, TableManager tableManager, StudentHostingCard.StudentMovementSource movementSource, StudentHostingCard.StudentMovementDestination movementDestination, boolean autoUpdateToMatchMaxStudentCount) throws StudentHostingCardIncorrectUpdateParametersException
      Performs the movement of a Student from a source object to a destination object, adapting to varios cases to cover for all character actions
      Parameters:
      s - (type Student) The sStudent to move
      numberOfStudentsToMove - (type int) The number of student to move
      pSource - (type Player) The Player source of the movement
      pDest - (type Player) The destination player of movement
      tableManager - (type Table) The table manager object, used to access table-related objects such as Islands
      dstIslandIndex - (type int) The index of the target island
      movementSource - (type StudentMovementSource) The source of movement
      movementDestination - (type StudentMovementSource) The destination of movement
      autoUpdateToMatchMaxStudentCount - (type boolean) Whether the method should automatically pick new Students from the bag after the movement
      Throws:
      StudentHostingCardIncorrectUpdateParametersException - if the parameter to update card are incorrect
